descriptionHtml:
The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

Rena's Craftable Clothing
================================================================

================================================================
Installation instructions
----------------------------------------------------------------
1- Extract Rena's Craftable Clothing.esp to your "Skyrim/Data" folder.
2- Enable Rena's Craftable Clothing.esp
3- Launch Skyrim

or

Use Nexus Mod Manager
================================================================
Mod Description
----------------------------------------------------------------
Enables the ability to craft all basic clothing at the forge.
It also enables you to craft linen from Tundra Cotton at the tanning rack
All clothing are craftable by using variations of leather, leather straps, and linen.
Some clothing may require other materials.
All materials used to make clothing is based upon the looks of the female version of clothing.
So if using a male character the materials used to make the clothes may not match the look of the outfit.
Items Appear in the Misc Section


Items you can make

Alik'r Hood
Barkeeper
Barkeeper Variant
Barkeeper Shoes
Belted Tunic
Black Robes
Blacksmith's Apron
Blacksmith's Variant
Blacksmith's Shoes
Blue Robes
Farm Boots
Merchant Boots
MG Boots
Miner Boots
Monk Boots
Necromancer Boots
Redgaurd Boots
Chef's Hat
Chef's Tunic
Farm Clothes
Merchant Clothes
Cowl
Fine Boots
Fine Clothes
Farm Hats
Merchant Hat
Fine Hat
Footwraps
Wedding Dress
Wedding Sandals
Wedding Wreath
Ragged Boots
Ragged Cap
Ragged Robes
Ragged Trousers
Gloves
Miner's Clothes
Mourner's Clothes
Mourner's Hat
================================================================
Version History
----------------------------------------------------------------
1.0 Initial Release

1.1 Removed Pelt to Linen conversion. Change to Tundra Cotton, 5 Cotton for 1 Linen


================================================================
Special thanks to Bernadette who helped make this mod possible.
Special thanks To user Vaul for the Tundra Cotton Suggestion.
----------------------------------------------------------------

================================================================
Agreement
----------------------------------------------------------------
For downloading and installing this modification I ask you to...
-Do not sell any of the contents of this mod

-Do read the Read-me

================================================================
Compatibility Information
----------------------------------------------------------------
Should be compatible with everything.
